body_html:
@alicetragedy ah thanks! I was sure I read everything … if the main site wasn’t redesigned in the last few days, I must’ve been on the teams apps the whole time and mainly read the Help section there, which also listed opening an issue here as first approach. (Which I also prefer since that was a question I assumed others could have too.)

Thanks for the info then, will use email for future stuff. :)

body:
@alicetragedy ah thanks! I was sure I read everything … if the main site wasn’t redesigned in the last few days, I must’ve been on the teams apps the whole time and mainly read the [Help section](https://teams.railsgirlssummerofcode.org/pages/help) there, which also listed opening an issue here as first approach. (Which I also prefer since that was a question I assumed others could have too.)

Thanks for the info then, will use email for future stuff. :)
